sense.def:
The side of something
je položaj levo ali desno od nečesa.

seg.quote: A taxi bumped into us from the side.
Standing on either side of him were two younger men.
I sat down by her side.

sense.def:
Kar je
on one side of a boundary or barrier
, je na enem od dveh območij, ki ju ločuje meja ali pregrada.

seg.quote: We were told of threatening developments on the other side of the border.

sense.def:
One's sides
sta dela telesa od pazduh do bokov.

seg.quote: She lay on her side with her back to me.

sense.def:
The sides of an object
sta zunanji površini predmeta, ki nista zgoraj ali spodaj.

seg.quote: The box opens on this side.
Hogan walked round to the side of the car and unlocked the door.
She was kneeling by the side of the bed.
Smithy left the side door open.

sense.def:
The sides of an area or surface
sta polovici nekega območja ali njegovi robovi.

seg.quote: Blood was streaming from one side of her face.
...the wrong side of the road.
A hedge surrounds my garden on three sides.

sense.def:
The sides of something flat
sta ravni strani ploskega predmeta, na primer lista papirja.

seg.quote: What does the leaflet say on the other side?

sense.def:
The sides of a hill or valley
so dvigajoči se ali spuščajoči se deli hriba ali doline med vrhom in vznožjem oziroma dnom.

seg.quote: We were driving up the side of a mountain.

sense.def:
A side road
je manj pomembna cesta, ki se odcepi od pomembnejše.

seg.quote: I slipped away down a side street.

sense.def:
The two sides of an argument, war, or game
sta skupini ljudi, ki si nasprotujeta v sporu, vojni ali tekmovanju.

seg.quote: The argument was settled to the satisfaction of both sides.

sense.def:
The two sides of an argument
sta nasprotni stališči v razpravi o nečem.

seg.quote: She only ever hears his side of things.

sense.def:
A particular side of something
je eden izmed več vidikov nečesa.

seg.quote: The producers wanted to emphasize the political side of the play.
There is something distasteful about this side of her character.

sense.def:
The two sides of one's family
so sorodniki iz očetove in materine rodbine.

seg.quote: My grandparents on my father's side were both Polish.

sense.def:
To put something to one side
pomeni nekaj ločiti od drugih stvari, da se bomo s tistim ukvarjali pozneje.

Kadar sta dve osebi
side by side
, sta druga ob drugi.

cit.quote: tesno skupaj, z ramo ob rami

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
at someone's side
ali
by someone's side
, je v bližini nekoga in ga podpira ali tolaži.

seg.quote: He wanted to live forever by her side.

sense.def:
To take sides
ali
to take someone's side
pomeni podpirati nekoga, ki je v sporu z nekom drugim.

seg.quote: I wouldn't want anyone to take my side against Tom.

sense.def:
To be on someone's side
pomeni podpirati nekoga, ki je v sporu ali vojni z nekom drugim.

seg.quote: Whose side are you on?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
on the side
, tisto naredimo poleg svojega rednega dela.

seg.quote: If the farm prospers, we could start a little business on the side.

sense.def:
Izraz
side
lahko uporabimo, ko želimo povedati svoje mnenje o velikosti ali kakovosti nečesa. Na primer, če je nekaj
on the large side
, je nekoliko preveliko.

seg.quote: The food is excellent though on the expensive side.

sense.def:
To keep on the right side of someone
pomeni, da poskušamo nekomu ustreči in se trudimo, da ga ne bi spravili v slabo voljo.

cit.quote: z nekom delati v rokavicah, biti vedno prijazen z nekom

sense.def:
To side with someone
pomeni podpirati nekoga v sporu z nekom drugim.

seg.quote: The daughters sided with their mothers.
